verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH8010>, when Solomon had finished <WH3615> the building <WH1129> of the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>, and the king <WH4428>'s house <WH1004>, and all Solomon <WH8010>'s desire <WH2837> which he was pleased <WH2654> to do <WH6213>,
That the Lord <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to Solomon <WH8010> the second time <WH8145>, as he had appeared <WH7200> unto him at Gibeon <WH1391>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him <WH8085>, I have heard your prayer <WH8605> and your supplication <WH8467>, that you have made <WH2603> before <WH6440> me <WH6942>: I have hallowed this house <WH1004>, which you have built <WH1129>, to put <WH7760> my name <WH8034> there for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>; and my eyes <WH5869> and my heart <WH3820> shall be there perpetually <WH3117>.

And if you will walk <WH3212> before <WH6440> me <WH1732>, as David your father <WH1> walked <WH1980>, in integrity <WH8537> of heart <WH3824>, and in uprightness <WH3476>, to do <WH6213> according to all that I have commanded <WH6680> you <WH8104>, and will keep my statutes <WH2706> and my judgments <WH4941>:

Then I will establish <WH6965> the throne <WH3678> of your kingdom <WH4467> upon Israel <WH3478> for ever <WH5769>, as I promised <WH1696> to David <WH1732> your father <WH1>, saying <WH559>, There shall not fail <WH3772> you a man <WH376> upon the throne <WH3678> of Israel <WH3478>.

But if you shall at all <WH7725> turn <WH7725> from following <WH310> me <WH1121>, you or your sons, and will not keep <WH8104> my commandments <WH4687> and my statutes <WH2708> which I have set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you <WH1980>, but go and serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and worship them <WH7812>:

Then will I cut off <WH3772> Israel <WH3478> out <WH6440> of the land <WH127> which I have given <WH5414> them <WH1004>; and this house, which I have hallowed <WH6942> for my name <WH8034>, will I cast out <WH7971> of my sight <WH6440>; and Israel <WH3478> shall be a proverb <WH4912> and a byword <WH8148> among all people <WH5971>:

And at this house <WH1004>, which is high <WH5945>, every one that passes <WH5674> by it shall be astonished <WH8074>, and shall hiss <WH8319>; and they shall say <WH559>, Why has the Lord <WH3068> done <WH6213> thus unto this land <WH776>, and to this house <WH1004>?

And they shall answer <WH559>, Because they forsook <WH5800> the Lord <WH3068> their God <WH430>, who brought forth <WH3318> their fathers <WH1> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and have taken hold <WH2388> upon other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and have worshiped <WH7812> them <WH5647>, and served them <WH3068>: therefore has the Lord brought <WH935> upon them all this evil <WH7451>.

And it came to pass at the end <WH7097> of twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141>, when Solomon <WH8010> had built <WH1129> the two <WH8147> houses <WH1004>, the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>, and the king <WH4428>'s house <WH1004>,

(Now Hiram <WH2438> the king <WH4428> of Tyre <WH6865> had furnished <WH5375> Solomon <WH8010> with cedar <WH730> trees <WH6086> and fir <WH1265> trees <WH6086>, and with gold <WH2091>, according to all his desire <WH2656>,) that then <WH227> king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> gave <WH5414> Hiram <WH2438> twenty <WH6242> cities <WH5892> in the land <WH776> of Galilee <WH1551>.
And Hiram <WH2438> came out <WH3318> from Tyre <WH6865> to see <WH7200> the cities <WH5892> which Solomon <WH8010> had given <WH5414> him <WH3474>; and they pleased him not.
And he said <WH559>, What cities <WH5892> are these which you have given <WH5414> me <WH251>, my brother? And he called <WH7121> them the land <WH776> of Cabul <WH3521> unto this day <WH3117>.
And Hiram <WH2438> sent <WH7971> to the king <WH4428> sixscore <WH3967> talents <WH3603> of gold <WH2091>.

And this is the reason <WH1697> of the levy <WH4522> which king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> raised <WH5927>; for to build <WH1129> the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>, and his own house <WH1004>, and Millo <WH4407>, and the wall <WH2346> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, and Hazor <WH2674>, and Megiddo <WH4023>, and Gezer <WH1507>.

For Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> had gone up <WH5927>, and taken <WH3920> Gezer <WH1507>, and burnt <WH8313> it with fire <WH784>, and slain <WH2026> the Canaanites <WH3669> that lived <WH3427> in the city <WH5892>, and given <WH5414> it for a present <WH7964> unto his daughter <WH1323>, Solomon <WH8010>'s wife <WH802>.
And Solomon <WH8010> built <WH1129> Gezer <WH1507>, and Beth <WH1032>–horon the nether <WH8481>,
And Baalath <WH1191>, and Tadmor <WH8412> in the wilderness <WH4057>, in the land <WH776>,

And all the cities <WH5892> of store <WH4543> that Solomon <WH8010> had <WH5892>, and cities for his chariots <WH7393>, and cities <WH5892> for his horsemen <WH6571>, and that <WH2837> which Solomon <WH8010> desired <WH2836> to build <WH1129> in Jerusalem <WH3389>, and in Lebanon <WH3844>, and in all the land <WH776> of his dominion <WH4475>.

And all the people <WH5971> that were left <WH3498> of the Amorites <WH567>, Hittites <WH2850>, Perizzites <WH6522>, Hivites <WH2340>, and Jebusites <WH2983>, which were not of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>,

Their sons <WH1121> that were left <WH3498> after <WH310> them in the land <WH776>, whom the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> also were not able <WH3201> utterly to destroy <WH2763>, upon those did Solomon <WH8010> levy <WH5927> a tribute <WH4522> of bondservice <WH5647> unto this day <WH3117>.

But of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did Solomon <WH8010> make <WH5414> no bondmen <WH5650>: but they were men <WH582> of war <WH4421>, and his servants <WH5650>, and his princes <WH8269>, and his captains <WH7991>, and rulers <WH8269> of his chariots <WH7393>, and his horsemen <WH6571>.

These were the chief <WH8269> of the officers <WH5324> that were over Solomon <WH8010>'s work <WH4399>, five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>, which bore rule <WH7287> over the people <WH5971> that worked <WH6213> in the work <WH4399>.

But Pharaoh <WH6547>'s daughter <WH1323> came up <WH5927> out of the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732> unto her house <WH1004> which Solomon had built <WH1129> for her <WH1129>: then did he build Millo <WH4407>.

And three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in a year <WH8141> did Solomon <WH8010> offer <WH5927> burnt offerings <WH5930> and peace offerings <WH8002> upon the altar <WH4196> which he built <WH1129> unto the Lord <WH3068>, and he burnt incense <WH6999> upon the altar <WH4196> that was before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>. So he finished <WH7999> the house <WH1004>.

And king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> made <WH6213> a navy of ships <WH590> in Ezion <WH6100>–geber, which is beside Eloth <WH359>, on the shore <WH8193> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>, in the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>.
And Hiram <WH2438> sent <WH7971> in the navy <WH590> his servants <WH5650>, shipmen <WH582> that had knowledge <WH3045> of the sea <WH3220>, with the servants <WH5650> of Solomon <WH8010>.

And they came <WH935> to Ophir <WH211>, and fetched <WH3947> from there gold <WH2091>, four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> talents <WH3603>, and brought <WH935> it to king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010>.
